name: Ancient Imperial Dragon
movement: swim 40 ft., walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: The Ancient Imperial Dragon is an immense and awe-inspiring dragon known for its overwhelming power and mastery of nature, characterized by exceptional physical strength and distinctive scales.
memorable: With the ability to charm opponents and transform its appearance, this dragon is both a fearsome combatant and a master of manipulation.
goals: To assert dominance in its territory and engage in powerful magical displays.
relations: Often encountered with other high-level dragons or commanding lesser dragon-like creatures.
environment: Typically found in domains of great natural beauty, such as mountains, forests, or near large bodies of water.
strengths: Exceptional physical prowess, high hit points, strong defenses, and a wide array of potent magical abilities.
weaknesses: While resilient, its large size may make it less maneuverable in confined spaces.
attacks: Devastating melee attacks including a powerful bite, slashing claws, and a crushing tail, alongside a breath weapon unleashing massive lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath that deals substantial damage in a wide line and can incapacitate multiple foes.
senses: Possesses blindsight to a range of 60 feet and an extremely high passive perception of 30.
skills: Exhibits exceptional knowledge and proficiency in arcana, history, insight, and perception.
additional_information: Amphibious trait allows breathing in both air and water.
Can communicate with any living creature using Truespeak.
Inherently casts powerful spells without components.
Can change its shape to a humanoid or lower CR beast for infiltration.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with the ability to cast a variety of water and weather-related spells at will, with additional powerful spells available a limited number of times per day.
